articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with servicepersons enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 963.
					 The squad put on the stage mixed chorus "Please Receive Our Salute", female vocal solo "O. Mother Party", female quintet "Party Represents Care of the General" and other numbers of diverse genres.
					
					 Through the performance replete with the revolutionary soldier spirit the performers successfully represented the invincible might of the KPA which has grown to be a matchless army under the loving care of the great brilliant commander and the firm faith and will of the servicepersons to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms, always remaining true to the Party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly estimated the successful performance and extended thanks to the creators and artistes, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the members of the art squad staged a splendid performance rich in ideological contents and high in artistry with peculiar numbers truthfully representing the noble spiritual world of the KPA.
					
					 Saying that the members of the art squad are instilling the conviction of sure victory, optimism and the spirit and courage to wipe out the enemy into servicepersons through their militant performing activities as artistes of the revolutionary army, he highly appreciated their revolutionary work style.
					
					 Noting that art agitation is one of the effective means for educating servicepersons, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for conducting more dynamic performing activities as required by the Songun era.
					
					 Among the audience were Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Brazilian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Brazilian President
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Luiz Inacio Lula Da Silva, president of Brazil, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, which have entered a new phase in recent years, will steadily grow strong on the road of carrying out the common cause of building a new free, peaceful and prosperous world and sincerely wished the president continued great success in his work for the country's prosperity and the people's welfare.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Brazilian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Brazilian FM
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Celso Luis Nunes Amorim, foreign minister of Brazil, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on the principle of respect for sovereignty, equality and mutual benefit and wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Confidence-Building between DPRK and US Called for
articles.content:
Confidence-Building between DPRK and US Called for
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- It is meaningless to talk about non-proliferation without nuclear disarmament in ensuring the world peace and security, said a delegate of the DPRK, addressing the plenary meeting of the Geneva Disarmament Conference on August 31.
					 He stressed that the role of the disarmament conference, the only multilateral disarmament negotiating forum, is very important for realizing nuclear disarmament. 
					
					 Clarifying the views of the DPRK delegation for the success of the conference, he said:
					
					 Consistent is the stand of the DPRK government to build a solid peace-keeping regime and materialize the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 In order to bring the process for the denuclearization of the peninsula which suffered repeated frustrations and failures back on its orbit it is necessary to build confidence between the DPRK and the U.S., the main parties to the negotiations for the settlement of the nuclear issue. 
					
					 Confidence-building between the DPRK and the U.S. is the most urgent and it is the key to settling the issue. 
					
					 If confidence is to be built between the DPRK and the U.S. it is necessary to conclude, to begin with, a peace treaty for putting an end to the state of war, the source of their hostile relationship. 
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty provides the only reasonable way for realizing the denuclearization of the peninsula. 
					
					 Abnormal developments including various military exercises taking place in the peninsula and its vicinity prove the urgent necessity to conclude a peace treaty. 
					
					 Had a solid peace-keeping regime been built already in the peninsula, the nuclear issue would not have cropped up nor would have the issue of denuclearization been raised. 
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty would help put an end to the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. and rapidly push forward the denuclearization of the peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK Pavilion Day Celebrated Shanghai Expo
articles.content:
DPRK Pavilion Day Celebrated Shanghai Expo
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- An event observing the day of the DPRK pavilion of Expo 2010 Shanghai China was held on Monday.
					 Present there were the DPRK government delegation led by Minister of Urban Management Hwang Hak Won, Pak Myong Ho, minister of the DPRK embassy in Beijing, officials concerned, and the vice-minister of Housing and Urban and Rural Construction of China, the deputy general representative of the Chinese government at the expo, different personages and citizens of Shanghai.
					
					 Speeches were made by Hwang Hak Won and the Chinese vice-minister of Housing and Urban and Rural Construction.
					
					 They noted that General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China twice this year, achieving common understanding of the issues of common concern with Hu Jintao and other Chinese party and state leaders and injecting fresh energy into the development of the relations between the two countries.
					
					 They referred to the fact that the DPRK's pavilion draws keen interest of visitors as it shows the history and culture of Pyongyang, modern structures, customs and life of people and the appearance of the city in a huge park.
					
					 They stressed that Shanghai expo would contribute to deepening the political confidence between the two countries, promoting cultural exchange and friendship and developing the DPRK-China cooperative relations on a high stage.
					
					 The participants visited the pavilions of the DPRK and China and the main pavilion of the expo and enjoyed a performance given by the Pyongyang Art Troupe at Asia plaza in the area of the expo.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful pieces as chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il", an immortal revolutionary paean, male solo "It Is the Best Society" and dance "Dance of Janggu".
					
					 A reception was given on the occasion of the day of the DPRK pavilion and there was a performance by artistes of the Pyongyang Art Troupe that evening.

articles.title: IIJI Director-General Here
articles.content:
IIJI Director-General Here
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, secretary-general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, arrived here by air on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the founding of the DPRK. 
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Family of Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Family of Zhang Weihua
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the family of Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr Zhang Weihua on Tuesday on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the birth of the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Poman-ri
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Poman-ri
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here Tuesday visited Poman Fish Breeding Station and the Poman Cooperative Farm in Sohung County of North Hwanghae Province on the occasion of the 62nd founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They were briefed on the immortal leadership exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in front of the monument to their revolutionary activities.
					
					 They went round the water source, a pool for rainbow trout, a pool for catfish and other places of the Poman Fish Breeding Station and visited a farmer's house and a power station.
					
					 They expressed deep admiration at the fish breeding station and the village of the farm which have turned into a socialist land of bliss.

articles.title: Wonsan Branch Zoo
articles.content:
Wonsan Branch Zoo
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Wonsan branch zoo of the Central Zoo is situated at the foot of Mt. Jangdok thickly covered with trees in Wonsan, Kangwon Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The branch zoo, covering more than scores of hectares, has a several-kilometer-long course of visit.
					
					 Living at the branch zoo are many kinds of birds and animals in Korea and from different regions of the world.
					
					 Among them are vulture, parakeet, Phungsan dog, Jindo dog, wolf and donkey, buzzard, raccoon dog, fox, deer, turkey, pheasant, white-fronted goose and musk duck.
					
					The branch zoo has applied Koryo medicine to prolong their life and increase breeding coefficient. 
					
					 It is visited by lots of people, including schoolchildren, to enjoy a good time and get a zoological knowledge.

articles.title: Jilin Yuwen Middle School
articles.content:
Jilin Yuwen Middle School
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Jilin Yuwen Middle School in northeastern China typifies DPRK-China friendship.
					 President Kim Il Sung studied at the school in the period from Juche 16 (1927) to Juche 18 (1929), during which he formed revolutionary organizations such as the Anti-imperialist Youth League and the Young Communist League of Korea and energetically guided youth and students in their anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 The Chinese government and people have kept the school and its historical relics well preserved to show feats performed by the President, who made a great contribution to the victory of revolution not only in Korea but also in China and provided deep-rooted traditions of bilateral friendship.
					
					 Standing on the campus is a statue of the President. Preserved at the classroom are the desk, chair and other things he used in his school days more than 80 years ago.  
					
					When visiting the school in August, General Secretary Kim Jong Il left at the school his autograph "I wish Yuwen Middle School, which is symbolic of DPRK-China friendship and has a long history and tradition, will train many more excellent personnel. August 26, 2010. Kim Jong Il." 
					
					 The school has friendly ties with Changdok School in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Popular Education System
articles.content:
Popular Education System
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean people enjoy the free socialist education system thanks to the popular educational policy consistently pursued by the Workers' Party and Government of Korea.
					 Since he started revolutionary activities, President Kim Il Sung had paid close attention to the development of education, considering the education of the rising generation as a matter decisive of the country's destiny and the nation's future.
					
					 He set up Samgwang School on an experimental basis in Guyushu in the early 1930s to give free education to young people. With experience gained from the socialist education, he put forward tasks for establishing a popular education system in "The Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" he worked out in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 He had a matter of pencil put on the agenda of the first session of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea held in February Juche 35 (1946) and led the entire people to turn out in the effort for the development of education, giving priority to the educational work. 
					
					 He made sure that the educational work continued without interruption even in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War and that universities and all other schools were reconstructed before anything else in the postwar period. Under his leadership the country introduced the universal compulsory primary and secondary education systems in the 1950s, the universal 9-year compulsory technical education system in the 1960s and the universal 11-year compulsory education system in the 1970s.
					
					 In September 1977 he published "Theses on Socialist Education" to clearly indicate the way to be followed by Juche-based education.
					
					 The socialist education system, established by the President, has been further consolidated under deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The younger generation are preparing themselves as successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche, equipped with a wide range of knowledge, under the best socialist education system.
					
					The study-while-working education system is also available in the country.

articles.title: US Arms Sale to South Korea Flayed
articles.content:
US Arms Sale to South Korea Flayed
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- An "annual report on the military aid" published by the U.S. Department of Defense recently revealed that the U.S. has massively delivered all type weapons and military equipment to south Korea. It sold to south Korea latest war hardware to the tune of 462 million U.S. dollars last year alone.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The U.S. increased arms sale to south Korea betrays its sinister intention to sharply increase its delivery of sophisticated weapons to south Korea in a bid to prepare the puppet forces as independent war forces, round off the preparations for a second Korean war and tighten the military alliance between the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal driving the puppet forces to the escalated confrontation with the DPRK and disturbing the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. moves to bolster up its combat capability have turned south Korea into a hotbed of a new war, a nuclear war and created a touch and go situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 U.S. nuclear weapons are densely deployed in south Korea and in its vicinity and the interests of powers are intermingled with each other on the Korean Peninsula. In case a war breaks out there, it will quickly develop into a world thermonuclear war.
					
					 Defusing the tension and ensuring peace on the peninsula are not only a regional problem but also the most important and responsible task to save the world from a nuclear war disaster.
					
					 If the U.S. shuns the conclusion of a peace treaty and seeks to bring down the DPRK by force of arms from the stand of strength to stifle the DPRK, the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. will fester and a war on the peninsula will be unavoidable.
					
					 Whether a war is averted and peace is ensured on the peninsula or not entirely depends on the U.S. attitude.
					
					 It will be a beneficial option for the U.S. to defuse the danger of a war and make a bold decision to build a new peace-keeping regime on the peninsula.

articles.title: Japan's Military Maneuvers Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Military Maneuvers Assailed
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Japan's Ground "Self-Defence Force" recently staged military exercises in Hokkaido with a large number of troops and military equipment involved. Reportedly they perfected an operation of going from defense over to offensive action through the exercises aimed to examine in an overall way the display of combat capability at maximum. Meanwhile the GSDF conducted a large-scale live firing drill at the Higashifuji range in Shizuoka Prefecture.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday carries a signed commentary in this regard.
					
					 Such military exercises in Japan, reminiscent of a war, are little different from an open declaration at home and abroad on Japan's intention to set out on the road of overseas aggression, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries seek to put into practice their scenario for overseas aggression by further increasing the SDF combat capability through the intensified movement for turning Japan into a military giant.
					
					 They are busy examining the dispatch of escort warships, patrol planes and other mobile strike forces of Japan to the PSI joint naval exercises the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities have planned to stage with some countries next month. This is also prompted by the said intention. Their planned dispatch of SDF troops is intended to attain their insidious aims through strengthened military tie-ups with the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					 Undoubtedly, Japan's launch of overseas aggression will wreck peace and stability not only in Asia but also in the rest of the world.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are getting overheated in the scheme for reinvasion over the fictitious "threat" from the DPRK. The fact makes it easy to guess who the main target of the militarist aggression forces is.
					
					 The Japanese militarists are, however, seriously mistaken. Their reckless moves for conversion of Japan into a military giant and overseas expansion are as foolish an act as jumping out of frying pan into fire.

articles.title: Koreans Called on to Hold Banner of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Koreans Called on to Hold Banner of Juche Idea
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President
					 Kim Il Sung, serves as an eternal banner of victory of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and a powerful treasured sword for building a thriving nation, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 The Juche idea provides a sure guarantee for building a socialist political power and serves as a powerful treasured sword for building a socialist military power and provides firm guidelines for building a socialist economic power, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The politico-ideological might of the DPRK, the might of single-minded unity that grew strong under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea has reached the highest level. It is the revolutionary faith of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and glorify
						 Kim Il Sung's Korea for all ages come what may. This has been enshrined as the indomitable will of the army and people of the DPRK who are displaying matchless patriotic enthusiasm, breathing the same breath with Kim Jong Il on a forced march and keeping pace with his advance. This is an exciting reality of the DPRK today.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics of the WPK, the DPRK has turned into an invincible military power which no formidable enemy dares provoke. All members of the society have become an elite powerful army with the revolutionary strong army of Mt. Paektu with tremendous might as a main force. It has emerged a matchless power backed by a strong foundation of the national defence industry based on the cutting-edge science and technology. The traits of attaching importance to the army and military affairs are prevailing throughout the country. Songun Korea today has turned into an invulnerable socialist fortress as it has been placed under a perfect nationwide and all-people defence system. The DPRK proudly ranked itself among the nuclear weapons states and has become an impregnable fortress where the destiny and future of all the generations to come are fully guaranteed. This is a shining fruition of the WPK's Songun politics.
					
					 The Korean people are bringing a new era of the victory of the Juche idea to this land in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, holding high the slogan "Korea can do anything if it is determined!".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's China Visit Hailed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's China Visit Hailed
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Organizations in France and Switzerland made public statements in congratulation of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's successful visit to China.
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association in a statement on Sept. 1 said that Kim Jong Il's recent China visit was a historic one as it made great contribution to further consolidating the DPRK-China friendship and enhancing the international prestige of the DPRK.
					
					 The association, encouraged by his successful visit to China, will more widely conduct the solidarity activities for support to the Korean people in their just cause of building a thriving nation, achieving national reunification and realizing peace, stability and prosperity of the Korean Peninsula, the statement stressed.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Switzerland in a joint statement on August 31 noted with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il powerfully promoted the development of the traditional DPRK-China relations of friendship and cooperation by visiting China again this year.
					
					  Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, said in a statement on the same day that Kim Jong Il's China visit gave a shock to the international community, causing a great sensation.
					
					 Paying the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il who made distinguished contribution to preserving peace and security of the world and advancing the human cause of independence against imperialism through his recent China visit, all the members of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico heartily wish him good health and great success in his noble work to lead the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and the world progressives for building of a thriving nation, the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and global independence, the statement said.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a seminar took place in Bangladesh and a lecture in Guinea from Aug. 25 to 30 on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 Displayed in the venues were photos on the feats President        Kim Il Sung performed in the nation-building and General Secretary Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits. 
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, and other personages in their speeches highly praised Kim Il Sung as the founder of socialist Korea and an invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation, adding that the revolutionary exploits performed by him would always be remembered by the Korean people and progressive humankind along with the century. 
					
					 They expressed conviction that the DPRK, which has turned into a political and ideological power and a military power under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, will win one victory after another in the future, too. 
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, advisor to the Bangladesh Barisal Society for the Study of Songun Policy, said in his speech that Kim Il Sung's founding of the DPRK is an immortal contribution to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence. 
					
					Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, said in the lecture titled "The mental power of DPRK" that the DPRK's history spanning more than six decades is recorded with uninterrupted eye-opening events.
					
					 He emphasized that the mental power of the Korean people would surely bring about a stirring reality called a thriving nation before long.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente brasileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente brasileno
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Federativa del Brasil, Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, en ocasion del dia de la independencia de este pais sudamericano.
					En su misiva el remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises, que en los ultimos anos han entrado en la nueva fase de desarrollo, se ampliaran y se desarrollaran sin cesar en el camino del cumplimiento de la causa comun para construir un nuevo mundo libre, pacifico y prospero, y desea de todo corazon al destinatario que siga logrando grandes exitos en sus labores para la prosperidad del pais y el fomento del bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje de felicitacion a su par brasileno
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje de felicitacion a su par brasileno
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de la independencia de Brasil, el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun envio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo brasileno Celso Luis Nunes Amorim.
					En su misiva el remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises continuaran desarrollandose segun los principios de respeto a independencia, igualdad y beneficio mutuo, y desea al destinatario exitos en sus labores responsables.

articles.title: Delegado coreano insiste en crear la confianza entre Corea y EE.UU.
articles.content:
Delegado coreano insiste en crear la confianza entre Corea y EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Al hacer uso de la palabra el 31 de agosto en el pleno de la conferencia de desarme de Ginebra, el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dijo que sin el desarme nuclear, la no proliferacion no vale la pena para la preservacion de la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					 Para el desarme nuclear, es muy importante el papel de esta reunion, unico espacio de negociaciones multilaterales para el desarme, dijo.
					
					 Tras exponer la opinion de la delegacion coreana para el exito de esa cita, el hizo las siguientes declaraciones:
					
					 Es invariable la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de sentar el sistema de paz duradera y realizar la desnuclearizacion en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  A fin de volver a poner en la orbita el proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana que ha sido frustrado y fracasado repetidamente, es preciso crear la confianza entre Corea y EE.UU., responsables principales del problema nuclear.
					
					  Esto es la tarea mas prioritaria y la clave de la solucion del problema.
					
					  Para cumplirla, es imperioso firmar primero el convenio de paz que ponga fin al estado de guerra, causa de las relaciones hostiles.
					
					  La concertacion de este convenio deviene el unico remedio racional para realizar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Las  circunstancias anormales, incluyendo diversos ejercicios militares que se desarrollan hoy dia en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno, demuestran lo apremiante de la firma del convenio de paz.
					
					  Si hubiera establecido ya el sistema de preservacion de la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana, no habria surgido el problema nuclear ni el de desnuclearizacion.
					
					  Si se firma el convenio de paz, seran eliminadas las relaciones hostiles entre Corea y EE.UU. y se impulsara con rapidez la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia exportacion de armas de EE.UU. al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia exportacion de armas de EE.UU. al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Segun el "informe anual de la ayuda militar" publicado hace poco por el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos, este pais suministra en grandes cantidades al Sur de Corea las armas y equipos militares de diversos tipos, en particular, en el ano pasado, vendio al segundo los armamentos sofisticados valorados en 462 millones de US$.
					Este hecho muestra el siniestro intento de EE.UU. de preparar a los titeres surcoreanos como fuerzas capaces de hacer la guerra independientemente, completar los preparativos de la segunda guerra coreana y fortalecer las relaciones de alianza militar EE.UU.-Sur de Corea.
					
					Asi subraya el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					EE.UU. es el que incita a los titeres surcoreanos a la confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y destruye la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Hoy, debido al aumento de la combatividad por EE.UU., el Sur de Corea se va convirtiendo en el foco de nueva guerra, la nuclear, y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se acerca al borde de guerra.
					
					Si estalla una guerra en la Peninsula Coreana donde en su parte surena y su contorno estan ubicadas densamente las armas nucleares de EE.UU. y estan enmaranados los intereses de las potencias, ella se extendera facilmente a la guerra termonuclear de alcance global.
					
					Aliviar la tension y preservar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana no es un simple problema regional sino el asunto muy importante y responsable para salvar Asia y el resto del mundo de los desastres de guerra nuclear.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue dando espaldas como ahora a la concertacion del convenio de paz y recurriendo a la campana hostil a la RPDC para atentarla por via militar, las relaciones bilaterales iran de mal en peor y sera inevitable la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					De la actitud de EE.UU. deciden la prevencion o no de la guerra y la preservacion o no de la paz en dicha peninsula.
					
					Tomar la valiente decision de eliminar el peligro de guerra y establecer el nuevo sistema que garantice la paz en la Peninsula Coreana sera una opcion conveniente tambien para EE.UU.
